name: Advanced Weight Gainer
description: Advanced Weight Gainer is a specially designed high calorie & high protein formula for individuals who seek to gain weight in a healthy manner. Advanced Weight Gainer is specially enriched with arginine, glutamine and lysine which performs a vital role in the weight gaining process. Advanced Weight Gainer is ideal for: underweight children, adolescents and adults as well as athletes. Also ideal for Cancer cachexic patients (Cancer patients who  are experiencing severe weight loss due to reduced appetite resulted from various reasons associated with cancer condition) and malnourished patients.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
